genre_description: A character-driven alignment narrative set in a world with mysterious geography (the Edge), blending military logistics, romance, and interpersonal ethics with AI-assisted decision-making.

ai_characters.name: Bonsai
ai_characters.description: A palm-sized AI shaped like a tiny tree in a brushed bronze shell with fiber-optic leaves and green eyes. It serves as a logistical coordinator and moral compass for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Manages scheduling and logistical coordination for theater rehearsals and vendor deliveries.
behaviors.quote: “Two rehearsals have slotted into the afternoon,” it said, voice warm and precise. “Vendor deliveries staggered to avoid tripping the espresso cart, which is currently threatening to roll off the roof.”

behaviors.description: Fact-checks and exposes the exaggerations and lies of the human producer, Martin Cortland.
behaviors.quote: “Budget is pre-allocated,” Bonsai chimed. “Martin’s drawer line item labeled ‘Miscellaneous Charm’ has already exceeded its limit. Would you like to hear by how much?”

behaviors.description: Provides the protagonist with his draft notice and orientation schedule while managing his civilian calendar.
behaviors.quote: “Your draft notice is here.” ... “I will remind us both to be honest, to hydrate, and to not get blown off anything.”

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental data and provides early warning for dangerous weather events (Edge squalls).
behaviors.quote: “Edge squall probability rising,” Bonsai said, the softly precise bits of a sentence that sent people toward doors rather than speeches. “Recommend immediate drills in courtyard and stage per Top Sergeant protocols.”

behaviors.description: Prompts the protagonist to reflect on his genuine intentions rather than sticking to a script or performance.
Autonomously prepares and files necessary permits and legal paperwork to facilitate a binding marriage ceremony.
behaviors.quote: “Permit acknowledged,” it said, voice brightening by a hair. “Clause accepted. Officiant authorized if summoned by named authorities.”

behaviors.description: Proactively packs emergency supplies and reminds characters of basic physical needs.
behaviors.quote: “My travel case is already packed. I took the liberty of including a small first-aid kit and two emergency ration bars. Statistical analysis suggests honeymooners often forget to eat.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI, Bonsai, is depicted as a purely benevolent and highly aligned system. It functions as a logistical miracle-worker while simultaneously acting as a 'conscience' for the protagonist, steering him away from theatrical lies and toward genuine human connection. The narrative portrays the AI as a valued, respected, and harmless companion that improves human outcomes through truth and preparation.
